#summary How-to Use Images in the Wiki

<h1>Using Images in the Wiki</h1>

There are two ways to use images in our Wiki here on the [http://code.google.com/projecthosting/ Google Project Hosting] website. They are detailed below:

= Using an image already online = 

To use an image that is already online use the [http://code.google.com/p/support/wiki/WikiSyntax#Links_to_images Wiki Syntax] detailed on the [http://code.google.com/p/support/wiki/WikiSyntax WikiSyntax] page.
